input_str: If you use chef-solo to provision your production servers, Vagrant makes it easy to set up a production- like environment on a local VM for testing purposes. It can however seem like wasted time to have to manually replicate the contents of your node definition in your Vagrantfile and more importantly it's easy to make a change to either the Vagrantfile or the node definition and forget to update the other to match. In this post I'll look
